name: Senior Data Engineer
description:
At Arrival, our team is creating best-in-class electric vehicles using a radical new method of design and production. We work with some of the world's leading businesses and governments to achieve our goal of redefining mobility and transport ecosystems, transforming how people and goods travel and enhancing urban environments for all communities.

Innovation, rapid development and testing help us to push the boundaries. Our New Method takes our portfolio of patented technologies created in-house, and combines it with assembly in Arrival Microfactories. It’s a groundbreaking approach, leading to products with maximum functionality, peak efficiency, and an elevated experience – at a much more competitive price than other electric vehicles, and even fossil fuel vehicles.

Now we're looking for Senior Data Engineer.

Responsibilities:

  • Design and develop secure, scalable, high-performance and reliable (cost-effective) data gathering and transformation solutions
  • Analyze company data going deep into vehicle design and manufacturing knowledge area
  • Define templates and processes for the raw data analysis, transformation and pipelines maintenance
  • Understand and deploy dataops processes
  • Establish and support integrations between data platform components, 3rd party and in-house developed software
  • Lead by example to review code, look for code issues, provide meaningful and relevant feedback to engineers, stay up to date with system changes and latest technologies
  • Comfortably present and acquire consensus using multiple methods: Written diagrams and text, in-person meetings, in-person and remote presentations to both technical and business audiences

Qualifications:

  • 5+ years of hands-on IT experience in Data Warehouse and ETL.
  • Extensive experience in the development and maintenance of different data pipelines in a variety of business domains
  • 5+ years of experience in understanding a variety of data capturing and transformations scenarios, butch and streaming pipelines, CDCStrong experience in SQL and NO-SQL databases
  • Hands-on experience with Python, Apache Spark, Airflow, familiarity with Databricks as a bonus
  • Hands-on experience with coroutines and async scenarios programming
  • Strong skills in data exploration on a business level, willingness to go deep into new knowledge area
  • Familiarity with graph databases, time-series databases, Kafka, and more is a plus
  • Knowledge or enthusiasm in vehicle design, manufacturing, construction is very welcome

What we offer:

  • To join highly scientific-intensive culture and take part in developing the unique product.
  • Flexible working environment - choose your working hours and equipment.
  • 28 days’ paid annual leave per year.
  • Medical Insurance from the first week of work.
  • Compensation for sports and English lessons.
  • Breakfast, soft drinks, juices, snacks in Office.
  • Latest technology to do your impactful work with
